title: Idea Nuova DreamWorks Trolls Stackable Tapered Storage Bin
features: DESIGN: Designed with Trolls graphics from the famous brand. The perfect addition to your child’s bedroom, closet or playroom. The design on this durable storage bin will add a pop of color along with your child’s favorite characters. This storage bin is an easy way to maintain clutter while adding a playful accent.

VERSATILE USE: This bin can be used in any room of the house for Toys, Games, Clothes, Shoes and more! Tapered design is easy for stacking when not in use. The ultimate solution to no mess! This will be your child’s new organization accessory for their items. This character stackable bin is the perfect addition to any home décor.

QUALITY LONG LASTING DESIGN: This bin is made from poly canvas fabric that is durable and made to withstand everyday use. They also feature metal grommeted handles so you can easily carry around. This Trolls Stackable Toy Storage Bin also folds for easy storage when not in use.

DIMENSIONS: The measurements for this storage bin are 12"H x 12"W x 11"D. The ideal perfect size. The sizing of this storage bin is simply perfect and will be your child’s new favorite storage accessory!
EASY CARE: Spot clean only for continued use.
description: Add a touch of fierceness to your daughter's room with the Trolls 2 Stackable Toy Storage Bin. Its modern, colorful and ecstatic design would go well in your princess' room, or any room. This character stackable bin is an easy way to maintain clutter while adding a playful accent. The canvas makes this stackable bin extremely durable. Your little one will love to put away all their toys and more in this spacious Trolls 2 Stackable Toy Storage Bin. This stackable bin is made of a soft canvas material. This Trolls 2 Stackable Toy Storage Bin also folds for easy storage when not in use. There is no assembly required for immediate use and it is easy to spot clean. The Trolls 2 Stackable Toy Storage Bin measures 12"H x 12"W x 11"D making it the perfect size to help keep your little one's play area or bedroom organized.
